title: Express & Standard Delivery
description: We deliver parcels within 24–72 hours in Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Khulna, and Rajshahi. Express delivery available in Dhaka within 4–6 hours from pick-up to drop-off.

title: Nationwide Delivery
description: Ship anywhere in Bangladesh quickly and securely with our trusted delivery partners.

title: Fulfillment Solution
description: From warehousing to last-mile delivery — streamline your e-commerce logistics with us.

title: Cash on Home Delivery
description: We handle COD transactions so your customers can pay at their doorstep, safely and easily.

title: Corporate Service / Contract In Logistics
description: Get custom logistics contracts tailored to your company’s needs for seamless operations.

title: Parcel Return
description: Convenient and quick parcel return solutions to improve your customer satisfaction.
